page.title: 06LEISURE ACTIVITIES.
page.content: Richard and Julia are finding out about what people do in their spare time,if any.We asked some old people some questions and here are the answers we finally received.Most of the people we interviewed like going to the church,and like going to the services held at the church.Then they can meet their friends regularly.Quite a few people like working and going to the farm.The farm owns the stables and it is next to the Easthorpe Hall.A few people we interviewed like going to see their friends somewhere in the village. Cycling was not a very popular subject.There were one or two people who had hobbies that we did not have on our particular list at the time.There were five old people who enjoyed playing board games because it filled their time up when they are at a loose end.
